title: Request not found. You do not have access to request #0. It may have been solved or deleted
body: nice you don't want help me -_- im sad

replies.body:
I cant send one either I got this message  Request not found. You do not have access to request #0. It may have been solved or deleted.
maybe its because I got banned but still my account got logged on by somebody else and got it banned

A ticket can only be viewed by the account that created.  This error can happen if you're logged into a different account in the ticketing center, or may need to clear your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).  Toss me your ticket number, and I'd be happy to check the status for you!
I have the same exact problem.Im not able to sumbit requests or continiue my current ones.And we are talking about the tickets i created a week ago.

This could be caused by some web issue.  Try clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), disabling extensions, or trying another browser.  If all else fails, you can still reach us via email at support@riotgames.com.  See you there!

I was able to confirm that your ticket was successfully received today and fielded to the correct team.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!  In the meantime, try disabling extensions or another browser to see if that helps access the ticketing center.  Otherwise, you should get an email as well with a response.
